title: Green Lemon Nicotine Pouches by Ace
description: TRY ACE GREEN LEMON NICOTINE POUCHES Green Lemon Nicotine Pouches by Ace are a thirst-quenching power of lemonade so cold the condensation makes it seem like the glass is leaking . It has similar undertones of fresh lemon. View all Ace Nicotine Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Medium Pouches KEY FEATURES: Citrusy Lemon flavoured nicotine pouches Designed for a strong nicotine kick Great substitute for cigarettes Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 16MG Per Gram | 9.6MG Per Pouch MORE ABOUT GREEN LEMON FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Ace's Citrus nicotine pouches feature a real kick with their high nicotine content and delicious citrus flavour. These pouches aren't for newbies and are suitable for experience nicotine pouch users. MORE ABOUT NICOTINE POUCHES Ace's tobacco-free, slim nicotine pouches are perfect for discreet usage. Each pouch fits securely under your lip, offering you a discreet and effective nicotine experience. Ace's pouches are for experienced users and are available in a range of flavours, so make sure you check out the rest of the range. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Ace Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Strong Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch) 16 MG Flavour Name: Green Lemon Flavour: Lemon and Lime Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
